value: The garb of Ljósálfheimr is not what I'm used to, but I do find it quite fanciful and elegant.
There's no need to tease me, you know. I'm not a child.
I suppose I'm lighter on my feet without the weight of armor, but I do miss the protection.
If only these wings were not merely for show. I'd love to soar through the sky!
I wonder if my brother would consider wearing a matching outfit. It could be fun!
If I had the power of the ljósálfar, I would ensure that my brother and Lyon had nothing but carefree dreams. Like the old days...
You're always a reassuring presence in my dreams. As soon as you appear, I know everything's going to be all right.
